thread.title: Watch NASA’s big exoplanet announcement live at 1PM ET - The Verge
thread.title_full: Watch NASA’s big exoplanet announcement live at 1PM ET - The Verge

author: Loren Grush
title: Watch NASA’s big exoplanet announcement live at 1PM ET - The Verge
text: Watch NASA’s big exoplanet announcement live at 1PM ET Just a heads up: it’s not aliens share At 1PM ET, NASA will be announcing a new exciting discovery about planets that orbit stars outside our Solar System. The space agency will have a number of panelists on hand for the announcement, including Sean Carey — the manager of NASA's Spitzer Science Center at Caltech — and Sara Seager — a notable expert in the study of exoplanets from MIT. People are encouraged to ask questions to the panelists through Twitter, using the hashtag #askNASA, and if you have even more questions once the announcement is over, there will be a followup Reddit AMA at 3PM ET. We can answer one question for you now though: it’s not aliens. (It never is.) Still, the discovery promises to be super cool and could help with our search for extraterrestrial life moving forward. Next Up In Science
